mapper.select: SELECT wor_volume.BookId AS bookId, wor_volume.VolumeId AS volumeId, wor_volume.VolumeName AS volumeName, wor_volume.VolumeWordCount AS volumeWordCount FROM wor_volume WHERE wor_volume.VolumeStatus = 0 AND wor_volume.BookId = #{wor_volume.BookId} ORDER BY wor_volume.VolumeId ASC
mapper.update: UPDATE wor_volume SET volumeName=#{volumeName} WHERE volumeId=#{volumeId}
UPDATE wor_volume SET VolumeStatus= 1 WHERE VolumeId=#{volumeId}
mapper.select: SELECT wor_volume.VolumeId, wor_volume.BookId, wor_volume.VolumeName, wor_volume.VolumeWordCount FROM wor_volume WHERE wor_volume.VolumeStatus = 0 AND wor_volume.VolumeId = (SELECT MAX(VolumeId) FROM wor_volume WHERE BookId = #{bookId})

SELECT wor_content.ContentId, wor_content.VolumeId, wor_content.ContentTitle, wor_content.Content, wor_content.ContentWordCount, wor_content.ContentUpdate, wor_content.ContentStatus, wor_content.ContentUrl FROM wor_content WHERE wor_content.contentStatus = '0' AND wor_content.VolumeId = #{wor_content.VolumeId}
